about_the_game:
The Decontaminator Pack will give you a full suite of properly insulated weapon frameworks for dealing with a ghastly planetary plague! No more gunk in your clips!
On top of the set of new unique Weapon Frameworks for all your weapons, the pack comes with a matching Paintjob for your Armors, as well as a new Paintjob for your Pickaxe.

- The Decontaminator Framework - a set of FULL MESH RESKINS of all weapons in the game.
- Decontaminator Paintjob for all your Weapon Frameworks.
- Decontaminator Armor Paintjob to match your new weapon Framework.
- Decontaminator Paintjob for your trusty personal Pickaxe.
- Bosco Paintjob for your trusty robotic companion


Important note: The contents of this Pack are cosmetic only!

content_descriptors.notes: Violence, Use of Alcohol, Strong Language

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5770 /w 1GB VRAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core
